      • Draw

        public Hand Draw​(Deck d)
          throws DeckException
        Parameters:
        d - - given deck to draw from
        Throws:
        DeckException - - if deck is empty, throw DeckException This method doesn't actually return anything, just adds a card to the 'cards' ArrayList, drawing from given deck.
        Since:
        Lab #1

        Since:

        protected void setHS​(HandScore hS)
        Parameters:
        hS - - given HandScore This method will set the HandScore for the Hand.
        Since:
        Lab #1

      • ScoreHand

        public abstract HandScore ScoreHand()
                             throws HandException
        This abstract method must be implemented in each class that extends Hand. HandPoker and HandBlackJack will be evaluated differently, but must be evaluated.
        Returns:
        HandScore calculated for given Hand
        Throws:
        HandException
        Since:
        Lab #1
